title: Update Home hero headline to include sweets and snacks

requirements.summary: Change the Home page hero headline to mention traditional sweets and snacks instead of foods.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the main hero <h1> no longer contains the word "Foods".
The hero <h1> displays exactly: "Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Sweets & Snacks".
No other user-facing text is changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the hero <h1> text from "Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Foods" to exactly "Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Sweets & Snacks". Ensure no other user-facing copy is modified and do not touch any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
